title: [Edito] Surface Duo and Android
description: Let’s answer the question: Is Android a good choice for Surface Duo? I have been creating applications for Windows Phone 7.x, 8.x and Windows 10 mobile for years, I have (and still am) a big fan of these OSes but let me share with you the reasons for their failures. It wasn’t because of the OS, it was very stable, good performance and very rich. It wasn’t because of the UX, this one was amazing and I still miss it....

title: Adding Static Code Analysis to Stack Overflow
Why I joined Benchling as a software engineer new grad
